text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Pokrovsk Raion | native_name = Покровський район | native_name_lang = uk | settlement_type = Raion | image_skyline = | image_alt = | image_caption = | image_flag = Flag of Pokrovsk Raion, Ukraine.png | flag_alt = Flag of Pokrovsk Raion | image_shield = Coat of Arms of Pokrovsk raion.png | shield_alt = Coat of arms of Pokrovsk Raion | image_map = Pokrovsk Rayon 2020.svg | mapsize = | map_alt = | map_caption = | pushpin_map = | pushpin_label_position = | pushpin_map_alt = | pushpin_map_caption = | coordinates = | coor_pinpoint = | coordinates_footnotes = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = | subdivision_type1 = Oblast | subdivision_type2 = Raion | subdivision_name1 = | established_title = Established | established_date = | seat_type = Admin. center | seat = Pokrovsk | government_footnotes = | unit_pref = Metric | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 4020 | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = | population_footnotes = | population_total = 386451 | population_as_of = 2022 | population_density_km2 = auto | iso_code = | website = Verkhovna Rada website | footnotes = }} Pokrovsk Raion is one of the eight raions (districts) of Donetsk oblast in eastern Ukraine. The administrative center of the district is Pokrovsk. There is a line of control, that goes thru Pokrovsk raion (as of 2024). Sometimes it is called the Pokrovsk front. Russian forces are fighting Ukrainian forces. The Battle of Marinka is going on (as of 2023). The city of Marinka is in Pokrovsk Raion.https://yle.fi/a/74-20010573/64-3-229467?utm_medium=social&utm;_source=copy-link-share. Retrieved 2024-05-23 ==Administrative divisions== ** Avdiivka (hromada) ** Bilozerske ** Dobropillia ** Hrodivka (map), Russian soldiers are there (year 2025) ** Kryvorizhia ** Kurakhove ** Marinka (map), Russian soldiers are there (2025) ** Myrnohrad ** Novohrodivka ** Ocheretyne (map), Russian soldiers are there (2025) ** Pokrovsk ** Selydove ** Shakhove ** Udachne ==Related page== *Line of control (during the War in Ukraine) *Warfare in eastern Ukraine during the Russo-Ukrainian War ==Sources== Category:Raions of Ukraine Category:Raions of Donetsk Oblast
title: Pokrovsk Raion
